_header: Victorious christian Prince our lord sovereign
_description: Thomas Hoccleve, Balade to King Henry V — five stanzas rhyme royal

HunHM744.First Lines:
Victorious cristen Prince our lord souereynOur lige lord ful dred
                    and douted we…
HunHM744.Last Lines:
…To vs ful greet for why to vs echoneWelcome be your peerles
                    persone
HunHM744.Attributed Title:
Ceste balade ensuante feust faite pur la bien venue du tresnoble Roy H
                        le Vt que dieu pardoint hors du Roialme de ffrance cestassavoir
                        sa dareine venue (f. 50v)
